name: Fish Control
description:
*play in 800 by 600 for optimal game experience because I don't know how to scale UI yet

In this game, the player has to control the population of the pond, the pond cant get too populated or to underpopulated or you will have to start over.  use the mouse to drag fish away from danger and into safety

this is a game I made in a day and there is still a lot I need to learn about unity

my goal for the game was to learn about mouse interactions with game objects
